=== About me ===

Colombian living in Panama City, '83 edition. I'm studying computer science at <nowiki>[[http://www.uip.edu.pa/|Universidad Interamericana de Panamá]]</nowiki> and working in <nowiki>[[http://www.mantistechs.com/|Mantis Technology Solutions]]</nowiki> as developer. I like to learn and read C/C++ source code from free software programs like <nowiki>[[http://kde.org/|KDE]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://amarok.kde.org/|Amarok]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.videolan.org/|VLC]]</nowiki> (great code :) ).

                  {{https://librarian.launchpad.net/7565357/face.icon.png}}

=== My Goals ===

==== Short term ====

* Become a <nowiki>[[http://kde.org/|KDE]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://amarok.kde.org/|Amarok]]</nowiki> developer. (good progress and priority)
* Help creating a strong <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-pa|Ubuntu LoCo Team Panama]]</nowiki>. (good progress)
* Comment in the new <nowiki>[[http://gplv3.fsf.org/|GPLv3]]</nowiki>. (done)
* Create a new comunity website for the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-pa-website|Ubuntu LoCo Team Panama]]</nowiki>. (slow progress)
* Create Ubuntu <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Templates|LoCo Template]]</nowiki> for <nowiki>[[http://www.typo3.org/|TYPO3]]</nowiki> CMS. (good progress)
* Help my friends and co-workers to use free software tools to design websites. (good progress)
* Help spreading GNU/Linux and free software. (good progress)
* Helping and promote more InstallFest in Panama. (medium progress)

==== Long term ====

* Take GNU/Linux and free software to the enterprise and schools in Panama. (slow progress)
* Become a Ubuntu MOTU. (plan for 2008)
* Promote the first <nowiki>[[http://softwarefreedomday.org/teams/centralandsouthamerica/Panama|Software Freedom Day]]</nowiki> in Panama. (slow progress)

=== GNU/Linux History ===

* I started using GNU/Linux in 2001. I tried several distributions (<nowiki>[[http://www.redhat.com/|Red Hat]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.opensuse.org/|SuSe/openSUSE]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.fedoraproject.org/|Fedora]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.mandriva.com/|Mandrake]]</nowiki>) and the <nowiki>[[http://www.freebsd.org/|FreeBSD]]</nowiki>.
* Now I'm a happy :) Kubuntu Gusty Gibbon user, I use Ubuntu since Dapper Drake.
